item.title: Creating a workflow with measurement protocol and R
item.description: This is a simple how-to guide on doing basic things with measurement protocol

item.title: Detect missing data in GA with R
item.description: How to compare data from GA to another dataset to see if there are any discrepencies

item.title: Pull data from multiple Google Analytics Properties with R
item.description: Benchmarking your data can be rough. In this post we go through how to pull data from multiple GA accounts

item.title: Source R scripts from github through Google Cloud Storage
item.description: Making changes to your pipelines can be rough if you are multiple people working on the same project. This guide shows you how to use Github to make it easier
